page.title: 05Civil Engineer at Plym.St.M.
page.content: He lives at Landscove near Ashburton and likes the area.He has travelled to the Middle East,Tanzania and Bangladesh.He{works from 8-5}and takes a packed lunch.He has{2 half hour {breaks.}He earns aproximately Â£10,000 p.a. and takes home approx Â£160 p.w.He is a{Site Agent}and has men working for him.He trained at{Plymouth {Polytechnic}and has worked on power stations,marine projects and many civil works.He starts the day by checking everything and he tries to be strict.Excavators,diggers and compressors are used and safety helmets are issued.Vandalism does occur but the foreman lives nearby with a small dog.The job of building the footbridge started on 7th May and should finish on 7th August and P.C.C. are paying for it.
